text.data-name: In order to focus on keeping the website simple to use for people from all walks of life, I wanted to prioritize specific features in the redesigned site. Primarily, I wanted people to feel comfortable as soon as they reached the home page. I wanted to fin
text.tspan: In order to focus on keeping the website simple to use for people from all walks of life,
I wanted to prioritize specific features in the redesigned site. Primarily, I wanted people
to feel comfortable as soon as they reached the home page. I wanted to find a way to
make “Featured Stories” more prominent so that visitors to the site have more
opportunities to learn about the Treasury Department’s most relevant information.
